>>>>> "softtouchit" == softtouchit  <softtouchit@...> writes:

    softtouchit> The more I look at SOAP, the less sense I can make
    softtouchit> out of it.  First of all, it appears to be nice
    softtouchit> little RPC but then everyone agrees that RPC is dead
    softtouchit> for Web Services. People then argue that SOAP is good
    softtouchit> because it serves as an envelope and the processing
    softtouchit> patterns associated are useful. Well, it appears that
    softtouchit> even HTTP headers can do better jobs.

    softtouchit> I really like to hear your comments on this.

SOAP is quite useful for asynchronous processing for example.
